item.title: 2024 National K-12: Does a Higher Rating Lead to a Higher Standing?
item.description: Statistics of 2024 National K-12 Grades Championship https://www.uschess.org/results/2024/k12/ Over 2,600 contestants from 43 states participated in the 2024 National K-12 Grades Championship The 2024 National K-12 Grades Championship attracted a total of 2,679 participants from 43 states. More than 1,000 participants (40%) came from New York, followed by Virginia with 250 participants (9%) and New Jersey with 218 participants (8%). Fourth grade (age 9) is the most competitive, with nearly 350 participants.
